title: MoparMiningLLC
author: MoparMiningLLC
created_time: June 20, 2022, 04:12:14 PMLast edit: November 25, 2022, 10:56:40 PM by MoparMiningLLC
content: Near the end of 2020, I released a DIY set of 5 poker chip wallets. You can see the original postings here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5280024.0 and here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5284106.0I still have 12  11 9 3 of the 5 chip sets as well. I also have approx 80 50 sets of 2 error chips (the manufacturer inverted the colors) I originally had 100 of each error but have given away and have used a few for personal use.The first chip is white with yellow secondary coloring - was supposed to be yellow with white secondary denominated in .0025 BTCThe second chip is black with purple secondary coloring - was supposed to be purple with black secondary denominated in .0075 BTC I would like to offer these as a 2 chip set, you will receive 2 chips and 2 serialized hologramsPrice is $15 per set with free shipping in the US - International orders will be sent to minerjones for reshipping. Pymts can be via BTC: bc1qn37ly2yjla0thlnfsverzezrvxtxdsyvecp4esstrike: strike.me/moparminingllccashapp: $MoparMiningLLCpaypal: MoparMiningLLC@gmail.comLN: Send me a DM for a LN invoice

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: not sure why the images are giving an error - typically do not have that problem with imgbb.com - will update shortly. for now, though can click the error and it will open to the image on the imgbb site.

comments.body: I have a set of these. They are great and definitely a bargain at $15. Steeley

comments.body: Jeez, I'm in the collectibles board a few times per day and I dont know how I missed these?...so I will take a set of the errorsand maybe a set of the 5 too....I'll pm you later and organise payment then.
